-nniSi#tAyAq(gm)q hi rakShA(gm)#si prEqratE# saqprEMrNA$nyEqvainA#ni hantiq pari#SritE yAjayEqd-rakSha#sAq-mana#nvavacArAya rakShOqGnI yA$jyAnuvAqkyE# BavatOq rakSha#sAq(gg)q stRutyA# aqgnayE# ruqdrava#tE purOqDASa#maqShTAka#pAlaqM 
nirva#pEdaBiqcara#nnEqShA vA a#sya GOqrA taqnUryad-ruqdrastasmA# EqvainaqmAvRu#Scati tAqjagArtiq-mArcCa#tyaqgnayE# suraBiqmatE# purOqDASa#maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEqdyasyaq gAvO# vAq puru#ShA - [  ]  8
